article_title: Lawmakers Seek To Exempt Tribes From ACA Large Employer Mandate

article_metadata.description: Lawmakers introduced bills this week to exempt Indian tribal governments from the scope of the Affordable Care Act’s Large Employer Mandate. The large employer mandate, codified at 26 U.S.C. § 4980H, generally requires employers with 50 or more full-time employees to offer health insurance that meets a certain minimum level of [...]
article_metadata.author: Timothy M. Todd
